content:
I have finished the problem set and passed all tests:

But I wasn't able to submit it to the course website since last Friday. It kept saying 'No file selected'. But when I clicked on 'download most recent submission' I was able to download my code. I didn't have this problem with PS1.

 I tried all kinds of methods:  use different browsers (safari, chrome), refresh the page, log out and log in, reboot my laptop, download a brand new homework folder and paste my code to the new hangman.py...... Nothing works. I went to the TA this morning and showed Sophie(Sophie Reynolds) the process. She suggested me to post this on piazza. If we still couldn't find out what's wrong, may I email my problem set to one of the TAs or the instructor so I could meet the deadline?
subject: Not able to submit hangmam.py

content: I believe your problem is that you changed the variable WORDLIST_FILENAME at the start of the code. Can you change it back to “words.txt”?
I think it works! Thank you so much!
I believe I am having the same issue, with an unchanged file name. How should I proceed? I also spoke to 2 TAs previously.
